SYSTEM: 04_OWL.pdf: Página 41
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza 
45 
OWL 2 
Disjoint Classes (II) 
• 
Making the classes Pizza, PizzaTopping and PizzaBase disjoint from one 
another.  
• 
This means that it is not possible for an individual to be a member of a 
combination of these classes – it would not make sense for an individual to be 
a Pizza and a PizzaBase. 
Add Disjoint Classes
speaker: SYSTEM
